hedline.hl1: Miss Smilow, Legal Assistant, to Wed Jeffrey Varsa, Lawyer, in September

LEAD: Mr. and Mrs. Joel E. Smilow of Westport, Conn., have announced September wedding plans for their daughter, Susan D. Smilow, and Jeffrey D. Varsa, the son of Dr. Evelyn E. Handler of West Newton, Mass., and George Varsa of New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Joel E. Smilow of Westport, Conn., have announced September wedding plans for their daughter, Susan D. Smilow, and Jeffrey D. Varsa, the son of Dr. Evelyn E. Handler of West Newton, Mass., and George Varsa of New York.

Miss Smilow, a graduate of the University of Colorado, is a legal assistant at the Ballin & Levine law firm in Boston and a staff assistant at the Fogg Art Museum in Cambridge, Mass. Her father is the chairman and chief executive of Playtex Apparel and the Playtex Family Products Corporation in Stamford, Conn. Her mother, Joan L. Smilow, is the president of the Lipmans' clothing shop in Annapolis, Md.

The future bridegroom, an assistant general counsel at the Massachusetts Industrial Finance Agency in Boston, graduated from Hamilton College and received a law degree from Boston University. His mother is the president of Brandeis University. His father is the president of Silo International, an export company in New York. His stepfather, Dr. Eugene Handler, is a professor of medicine at the University of Massachusetts Medical School in Worcester.
